action.action-desc: Mr. Soto (for himself and Mr. Budd) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To establish a blockchain and cryptocurrency position within the Office of Science and Technology Policy, and for other purposes.

section.header: Establishment of blockchain and cryptocurrency position within the Office of Science and Technology Policy
section.text: The Director of the Office of Science and Technology Policy shall establish or designate a blockchain and cryptocurrencies advisory specialist position within the Office to coordinate Federal activities and advise the President on matters of research and development relating to blockchain, cryptocurrencies, and distributed ledger technologies.
